abstract: Most of the nation’s retailers reported double-digit declines in October sales, underscoring how the financial turmoil has touched all consumers.
snippet: Most of the nation’s retailers reported double-digit declines in October sales, underscoring how the financial turmoil has touched all consumers.
lead_paragraph: Just ahead of the crucial holiday shopping season, most of the nation’s retailers reported double-digit declines in October sales on Thursday, underscoring how the financial turmoil has touched all stores, be they discount or luxury.

headline.main: Retailers See a Broad Slowdown Ahead of Holidays
headline.print_headline: Many Retailers’ Sales Fall by Double Digits
